decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 01.01:Site Location Plan;02.01:Existing & Proposed Site / Ground Floor Plan;02.02:Existing & Proposed Roof Plan;02.10:Existing & Proposed Section AA;02.11:Existing & Proposed
Section BB;02.20:Existing & Proposed Rear Elevation;02.21:Existing & Proposed Side Elevation
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023). | Other than the balconies identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2, no part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
description: Single storey side/rear extension (following demolition of existing single storey extension);  installation of four rooflights to side roofslope;
